---

# SolveJS Monthly Community Vote ({{MONTH}})

Use this issue to vote on what SolveJS should prioritize next.
Review last month's shipped summary issue before voting to avoid duplicates.

## Vote for utility priorities

- [ ] More validator locales and country presets
- [ ] Additional date/time helpers
- [ ] More object/data transformation helpers
- [ ] Additional numeric/business-math helpers
- [ ] More regex patterns + parser helpers

## Vote for docs priorities

- [ ] More framework guides (React/Vue/Svelte)
- [ ] More backend guides (Fastify/Hono)
- [ ] Migration guides from popular alternatives
- [ ] Performance benchmark deep-dives
- [ ] Real-world recipes by industry use case

## Any other proposal?

Describe your use case and expected API shape.
